name: TileGunner
description:
Just a new concept on a run n gun genre

W/A/S/D : Move

Left Click : Shooty shooty bang bang

standing on red tile reduce health by 20

standing on blue tile does nothing

standing on green tile increase health by 2

get shot by the moving gun deal 5 damage

and if a bad guy (dark red blocc) touch you, your ded

thats pretty much it...

its just a concept yet and I know it looks like crap but it will get better.... hopefully
